name: Lighthouse (Free Food Studios)
description:
A short and surreal midlife crisis horror visual novel about a lighthouse worker.

Inspired by the Lighthouse famicase art created by Paul O'Leary McCann for the My Famicase Exhibition 2021, and was originally made for the A Game By Its Cover 2021 game jam, but was not finished in time.

This game remains unfinished, as the story and development became meandering and unsatisfactory. Frankly, it's not very good. It also ends abruptly, so when the screen goes black and nothing happens, that means you've reached the end.

DEVELOPED BY FREE FOOD STUDIOS
